body_html:
Hey @klappradla. Before I get to a "real" review: did you use git mv? The diff looks like Git didn't recognise the move which makes the changeset very hard to read and will also lose our git history.

Also, I approved the CC complaints since we're just moving files here and not adding anything new.
body_text:
Hey @klappradla. Before I get to a "real" review: did you use git mv? The diff looks like Git didn't recognise the move which makes the changeset very hard to read and will also lose our git history.
Also, I approved the CC complaints since we're just moving files here and not adding anything new.
body:
Hey @klappradla. Before I get to a "real" review: did you use `git mv`? The diff looks like Git didn't recognise the move which makes the changeset very hard to read and will also lose our git history.

Also, I approved the CC complaints since we're just moving files here and not adding anything new.
